trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a class converts property change events to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: 指示类是否将转换到的属性更改事件<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The IRaiseItemChangedEvents interface is typically implemented together with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface and indicates that the list converts property change events to <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: IRaiseItemChangedEvents 接口通常实现连同<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>接口，并指示列表将转换到的属性更改事件<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged>事件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>

trans-unit.source: You rarely need to implement the IRaiseItemChangedEvents interface.
trans-unit.target: 很少需要实现 IRaiseItemChangedEvents 接口。

trans-unit.source: However, for performance purposes, your data source should implement IRaiseItemChangedEvents if it provides the functionality described previously, and your data source is interacting with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component, because this functionality is built into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，出于性能，您的数据源应实现 IRaiseItemChangedEvents 如果它提供了前面所述的功能和您的数据源与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>组件，因为此功能已内置于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>进行交互

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents"></xref> object raises <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents"></xref>对象引发<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents"></xref> object raises <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged"></xref> events when one of its property values changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents"></xref>对象引发<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged"></xref>事件时对它的一个属性值发生更改; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
